publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7242 Aileen Campbell: South Lanarkshire Eats Well—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of the Lanarkshire EAT guide, which has been produced for the first time by North and South Lanarkshire councils to raise awareness of what is considered the exciting range and high quality of food and drink on offer in the area; notes that a number of Clydesdale-based producers and restaurants are taking part in the 2010 guide, and recognises the importance of the food and drink industry to South Lanarkshire’s economy. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Sandra White* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-7242 South Lanarkshire Eats Well (lodged on 25 October 2010) Elaine Smith*, Jim Hume*
S3M-7242 South Lanarkshire Eats Well (lodged on 25 October 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
